Feedback.Title: We are interested in your feedback on scanR!
Feedback.Tooltip: We are interested in your feedback on scanR!
Footer.link.team: The scanR project and the team
Footer.consentInfo: We use cookies to improve scanR. These cookies help us to collect information related to your browsing on our site, and allow us, for example, to estimate the number of visits, how often the pages are visited or what search terms are used. You can accept or decline them.
